channel.title: tech on Chris Hua
channel.description: Recent content in tech on Chris Hua

item.title: Redesigning the GoBike Experience
item.description: Biking has changed my perception of San Francisco and encouraged me to explore more of it. I’ve been a customer of Ford GoBike (operated by Motivate, now owned by Lyft 1). There are some pros, and some cons… Pros of @fordgobike: cheap, lot of ebikes now Cons: unable to unlock any bikes this entire week — Chris Hua (@hingeloss) January 2, 2019 In the spirit of constructive criticism, I thought I’d redesign the GoBike concept from scratch.
